attributes.action: Make sailing part of learning at schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make sailing part of the nation curriculum in schools, pupils that are near the sea should take one lesson a week to go sailing. It makes pupils fit, healthy and fresh air. It also makes there brain more competitive. It has allready been tried by two pupils and it has been a success.
